name: ASAuthorizationAppleIDProvider.CredentialState
desc: Possible values for the credential state of a user.

items.name: case notFound
items.desc: The user hasn’t established a relationship with Sign in with Apple.

items.name: case revoked
items.desc: The given user’s authorization has been revoked and they should be signed out.

items.name: case transferred
items.desc: The app has been transferred to a different team, and you need to migrate the user’s identifier.
